text: William Owens (July 6, 1937 - January 22, 2022) was an American politician and businessman. He was the first Black state senator in the Massachusetts State Senate. Owens was born in Demopolis, Alabama. He was a member of the Massachusetts House of Representatives from 1973 until 1974. He was a Democrat. He was in the state senate from 1975 to 1982 and from 1989 to 1992.State Library of Massachusetts-Bill Owens papers (1989-1992)-biographical Sketch'Public Officials of the Commonwealth of Massachusetts 1991-1992,' Massachusetts General Court: 1991, Biographical Sketch of Bill Owens, pg. 70 Owens died on January 22, 2022 from COVID-19 in Boston, Massachusetts at the age of 84."Bill Owens, first Black state senator in Massachusetts, dies at 84" ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Boston Category:Politicians from Alabama Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Businesspeople from Alabama Category:Businesspeople from Boston Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Massachusetts
title: Bill Owens (Massachusetts politician)
